concept.title: NetworkConfig Object
concept.shortdesc: The NetworkConfig object is a JSON object that customizes the authentication system for network users.

conbody.p: The NetworkConfig object is a JSON object containing the following parameters:

row.entry: Used to customize the authentication system for custom network users.
A Livefyre-provided network name. For example: yourname.fyre.co.
Used to specify the types of media attachments visible in the App stream. For more information, see Restricting Media.
Used to customize text strings of the HTML elements in any of the Livefyre Core Apps. For more information, see String Customizations.
